handlers.concurrentTriggerTask: task '%s' is still running [Note: You may need to wait for a few minutes if you cancelled the task]
handlers.loginFailed: Login failed, the operation is terminated.
handlers.azureSignIn: Successfully signed in to Azure account.
handlers.azureSignOut: Successfully signed out of Azure account.
handlers.m365SignIn: Successfully signed in to M365 account.
handlers.m365SignOut: Successfully signed out of M365 account.

appStudioLogin.message: The Teams Toolkit requires a Microsoft 365 organizational account where Teams is running and has been registered. You can create a free testing account from M365 Developer Program if needed.

azureLogin.message: The Teams Toolkit requires an Azure account and subscription to deploy the Azure resources for your project. You will not be charged without further confirmation.
azureLogin.unknownSubscription: Cannot set subscription. Select a subscription that you have access to.

codeFlowLogin.loginFailureDescription: Cannot retrieve user login information. Login with another account.

graphLogin.warningMsg: The Teams Toolkit requires a Microsoft 365 account. This is the account that you use to log in to Microsoft Teams. The Teams Toolkit will use this account to manage applications and service principals.

localDebug.portAlreadyInUse: Port: %s is already in use. Close this port and try again.
localDebug.portsAlreadyInUse: Ports: %s are already in use. Close these ports and try again.

banner.title: Do you have any feedback on the Teams Toolkit extension?
